channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump indicates that Venezuela is responding to demands for ‘total access’ for US oil companies – US politics live
item.description: Statement on supposed agreement with Venezuelan government follows Trump’s threats of further military intervention Donald Trump ’s administration is ...

item.title: Merseyside police detective sacked for misconduct after paying boy, 17, for sex
item.description: DC John Rigby, who is awaiting sentence after pleading guilty to charges, told he brought policing ‘into disrepute’ A Merseyside police detective who ...

item.title: Maga media stars back Trump on Venezuela … mostly: ‘It doesn’t make any sense’
item.description: Maga media used to hate US foreign intervention – now some are cheering it on “I’m not going to start a war. I’m going to stop wars,” Donald Trump sai...

item.title: Minister rejects claim tougher drink-driving rules will kill off rural pubs – UK politics live
item.description: Minister says evidence from Scotland suggests cutting drink-drive limit does not have a ‘significant impact’ on pub trade Farage is now talking about ...

item.title: Europe live: Russia reportedly deploys naval escort for oil tanker near Iceland
item.description: Ageing vessel had previously been involved in Venezuelan oil exports Head of Zelenskyy’s office, Kyrylo Budanov, offered a bit more detail on the talk...

item.title: Learner drivers face longer wait for tests and a lower drink-drive limit
item.description: Proposed changes by the government may also include lower drink-driving limits for novice motorists.

item.title: Russia sends navy to guard oil tanker being pursued by US forces
item.description: US officials say that American forces plan to seize the Russian-flagged ship, which is accused of breaking sanctions.

item.title: Plot to kill Burkina Faso leader foiled, says junta
item.description: The security minister accuses neighbouring Ivory Coast of funding the plan to kill Capt Traoré.

item.title: Trump says up to 50 million barrels of oil will be 'turned over' to US
item.description: Earlier the president said US oil firms could be "up and running" in the country within 18 months.

item.title: Poor decisions in extending prison lease, MPs say
item.description: Report says "poor commercial decisions" were made when the lease was agreed with the Duchy of Cornwall.
